attributes.name: source
attributes.description: When enabled it renders source mode (code mirror editor with headers support)

attributes.name: readOnly
attributes.description: When set the editor is in read only mode.

properties.name: model
properties.description:
The view model to use to render the values.
Note, the `model` property is immediately updated when the `value` is set.
When the hosting application uses both values make sure to only set the `model` property.

Also note, there's no dedicated event for the model change. When value change then
the model changed as well.

properties.name: source
properties.description: When enabled it renders source mode (code mirror editor with headers support)

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: When set the editor is in read only mode.

properties.name: eventsTarget
properties.description:
By default the element listens on the `window` object. If this value is set,
then all events listeners will be attached to this object instead of `window`.

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatches when a value change after the user manipulate the editor value.

tags.name: headers-list
tags.description: An element that renders a list of headers.

properties.name: hasHeaders
properties.description: Tests whether there's anything to render.
